tool_description: Validates return requests against company return policies including time limits, product categories, and customer status.

order_id.description: Original order containing items to be returned

return_reason.description: Reason for return: defective, wrong_size, wrong_item, not_as_described, changed_mind, damaged_shipping

error_messages: Customer not found: Invalid customer ID or customer account suspended.
Order not found: Order ID does not exist or does not belong to customer.
Return window expired: Items are beyond the allowed return period for this product category.
Non-returnable items: One or more items are marked as final sale or non-returnable.
Invalid return reason: Must be one of [defective, wrong_size, wrong_item, not_as_described, changed_mind, damaged_shipping].
Return limit exceeded: Customer has exceeded maximum number of returns for this time period.
usage: Provide customer_id, order_id, product_skus array, return_reason, and purchase_date. Tool validates against all applicable return policy rules.

validation_result.description: Overall validation result: approved, conditional, denied

policy_violations.description: List of any policy violations found

conditional_requirements.description: Additional requirements if validation is conditional

return_deadline.description: Final date by which return must be completed
